title: Marathon 2: Durandal Review
description:
Durandal is back to forging his destiny in Marathon 2, though Bungie's full powers and true horrors of Infinity still await. Powered by Aleph One! Big thanks to @GianniMatragrano for his work!
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/MandaloreGaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore

07:33 - Gameplay Mechanics
